transcript.speaker: Priya Sharma
transcript.text: Metrics Dashboard is coming along. Marcus helped me with the websocket issue yesterday. Now I'm blocked on getting test data—need access to the staging environment.

transcript.speaker: Marcus Williams
transcript.text: I can help with that. Also, my Checkout Service PR is up for review. Would love eyes on it.

transcript.speaker: Sam Chen
transcript.text: I'll review it this afternoon. Priya, talk to Riley about staging access. What about the Auth Token Refresh Bug?

transcript.speaker: Marcus Williams
transcript.text: Still investigating. It's trickier than I thought—the issue is in how we're handling refresh tokens across microservices. Might need to refactor the auth middleware.

transcript.speaker: Sam Chen
transcript.text: Alright, keep me posted. That's a blocker for the Platform Migration if we don't fix it before Q2.

transcript.speaker: Priya Sharma
transcript.text: Quick question—should the Metrics Dashboard show auth-related metrics? Might help us catch issues like this earlier.

transcript.speaker: Sam Chen
transcript.text: Great idea. Let's add that to the backlog.
